channel.title: Alexander Trost aka galexrt
channel.description: Recent content on Alexander Trost aka galexrt

item.title: about
item.description: Hello, I’m Alexander Trost aka galexrt. I am a DevOps Engineer at Cloudical Deutschland GmbH and a maintainer of the Rook.io project. In my free time I’m administrating and maintaining the infrastructure of the “Modern Gaming” community. Social Twitter Xing LinkedIn GitHub Twitch.tv Blog Email Please note: I am not giving support through any of these channels. Thanks for understanding! Easter Eggs Coffee Funny This site has been built using Hugo with a customized version of the “Call me Sam” Hugo theme by @victoriadrake.

item.title: Impressum

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: The Site Notice / Impressum can be found here: Site Notice / Impressum page. German version of the Privacy Policy / Datenschutzerklärung below. Privacy Policy 1. An overview of data protection General information The following information will provide you with an easy to navigate overview of what will happen with your personal data when you visit this website. The term “personal data” comprises all data that can be used to personally identify you.
